paper_abstract: In this paper, the synchronization control of a general class of memristor-based recurrent neural networks with time delays is investigated. A delay-dependent feedback controller is derived to achieve the exponential synchronization based on the drive-response concept, linear matrix inequalities (LMIs) and Lyapunov functional method. Finally, a numerical example is given to illustrate the derived theoretical results. Crown Copyright (C) 2011 Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Exponential synchronization of memristor-based recurrent neural networks with time delays
